content:
Define a module named TopModule with input ports clk and in, and output port out.

Retrieved Related Information:
- clk: input signal, used to trigger the D flip-flop on the positive edge.
- out: output signal, output of the D flip-flop and one of the inputs to the XOR gate.
- A D flip-flop takes as input the output of a two-input XOR.
- The flip-flop is positive edge triggered by clk, but there is no reset.
- The XOR takes as input 'in' along with the output 'out' of the flip-flop.
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified. - input clk - input in - output out

content:
Implement a wire signal to hold the output of the XOR gate. The inputs to the XOR gate are 'in' and 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- in: input signal, one of the inputs to the XOR gate (Type:Signal)
- out: output signal, output of the D flip-flop and one of the inputs to the XOR gate (Type:Signal)
- The XOR takes as input 'in' along with the output 'out' of the flip-flop (Type:StateTransition)
source: The XOR takes as input 'in' along with the output 'out' of the flip-flop.

content:
Implement a D flip-flop that takes the output of the XOR gate as input. The flip-flop is positive edge triggered by clk.

Retrieved Related Information:
- clk: input signal, used to trigger the D flip-flop on the positive edge.
- in: input signal, one of the inputs to the XOR gate.
- out: output signal, output of the D flip-flop and one of the inputs to the XOR gate.
- A D flip-flop takes as input the output of a two-input XOR.
- The flip-flop is positive edge triggered by clk, but there is no reset.
- The XOR takes as input 'in' along with the output 'out' of the flip-flop.

content: Connect the output of the D flip-flop to the 'out' port of the TopModule.
